entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:05 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.5Â°C

Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 2:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

Humidity: 51 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
